    • Method Detail

      • inSegment

        public boolean inSegment​(java.lang.Number address)
        Handy utility to find out if given address is in a specified segment area starts at baseAddress, range baseAddress to limitAddress.
        Overrides:
        inSegment in class AbstractBlockTable<java.lang.Number>
        Parameters:
        address - the address to be checked whether it is in the specified segment area
        Returns:
        true if that address is within RISCV-defined memory map (MMIO) area, false otherwise.

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
